dt.t: Physically he is {wi}outsize{/wi}, standing six feet three and weighing 225 pounds …

dt: {bc}exaggerated or extravagant in size or degree

dt.t: … they loved Mayweather for his {wi}outsize{/wi} persona and the reminder it carries of the sport's past glories.
He was wearing a huge fur hat, a purple jacket with {wi}outsize{/wi} shoulders, and two pairs of spectacles, in tiers, emphasizing the narrow length of his face.

shortdef: exaggerated or extravagant in size or degree
